sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you want to <radical>go</radical> to <radical>Korea</radical> you'll need a good <kanji>defense</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Things in Korea haven't been on the safest side lately, so make sure you have some ways to defend yourself before you go.
readingMnemonic: You need a good <kanji>defense</kanji> to go to Korea, so you fill your pockets with <reading>a</reading>corns (<ja>えい</ja>). When you get to Korea you plant them all around yourself. In no time you'll have a strong tree defense, keeping you safe.
readingInfo: Okay, so maybe this defense strategy will take a while, but you aren't rich and acorns are on the ground for free. Don't judge!
